import{handleResponse,handleError}from'./ApitUtils';import axios from'axios';//main api
var baseUrl='http://localhost:3000/tasks/';//getting tasks
export function getTasks(){return axios.get(baseUrl);}//setting tasks
export function addTask(task){return axios.post(baseUrl,{task:task});}//deleting tasks
export function deleteTask(taskId){return axios.delete("http://localhost:3000/tasks/".concat(taskId));}//editing tasks
export function editTask(taskId,task){return axios.put("http://localhost:3000/tasks/".concat(taskId),{name:task});}
